about.play_to_earn_model: {"time":1655803960598,"blocks":[{"id":"WxMrnVHsy_","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The metaverse comes with plenty of lucrative opportunities, allowing people to generate steady income online from anywhere in the world"}},{"id":"JaXXGygVK2","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The metaverse revolution is upon us, garnering attention from tech giants and average users alike. Metaverse provides several ways of generating income online and trading digital assets with real-world value ."}},{"id":"mZfNiMLGvK","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"As unbelievable as it may sound, with the launch of the XANA metaverse, people will have plenty of revenue generation options from the comfort of their homes. In this article, we will discuss the top 5 ways you can make money in the immersive virtual world."}},{"id":"XFDMHP4_Yv","type":"header","data":{"text":"NFTs","level":2}},{"id":"jEsUow-cqt","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Until last year, we only saw NFTs exploding in the art sector, with CryptoPunk and Bored Ape Yacht Club showing an incredible price run. But in the XANA metaverse, these NFTs have the potential to be turned into wearable digital assets, and easily sold in NFT marketplaces that are integrated on the metaverse."}},{"id":"g7B3Esq2Tw","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Users can acquire avatars, virtual land, wearables, and equipment within the metaverse. All these digital assets in the metaverse are represented by NFTs so that their value is recorded on a blockchain, and this translates in real world value as well."}},{"id":"mpCIqv7EXu","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"There are many strategies that XANA metaverse users can utilize to generate an income using NFTs on the metaverse. Users can trade NFTs on the metaverse as a means to make some profit, but this does carry some risk, and would require some initial capital. Another method that does not require any capital, and is almost risk free is just using your creativity to make wearable digital assets for the metaverse, and sell them as NFTs."}},{"id":"w6MvjmCc5d","type":"header","data":{"text":"Gaming","level":2}},{"id":"7siDEW3XgE","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"At the moment, gaming is the leading activity on metaverse environments, and they allow people to earn significant money through their play-to-earn ecosystems. Users can also trade in-game assets represented by NFTs at NFT Marketplaces for tokens that carry real world value."}},{"id":"ZZSaLVTwXX","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"By playing blockchain-based games in the metaverse, you can unlock achievements and get rewarded. You can also generate income by building games for others to play and enjoy in the metaverse."}},{"id":"4FupW9J5MR","type":"header","data":{"text":"Education","level":2}},{"id":"g1aKdA36N3","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"With the pandemic forcing schools to shut down, the potential of virtual schooling has become more apparent than ever before. As the metaverse develops, it will become an increasingly immersive space that will make online education more interactive and personalized."}},{"id":"tdcc3svCXC","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"XANA metaverse allows educational institutions to set up a virtual school in the metaverse. The students will enjoy increased exposure to global instructors, carry out real-time chat, and interact with each other as avatars. The immersive learning experience will minimize the negative effects of remote schooling."}},{"id":"Pk7d_JyFMb","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Individual educators can set up their own learning facilities on the metaverse where they can charge their students to attend their seminars. Educators can charge their attendants in the form of tokens through an admission fee or sell NFT passes that will allow holders to attend their seminars."}},{"id":"zoLW94nKQ7","type":"header","data":{"text":"Fashion","level":2}},{"id":"LMvQtAN7qA","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Renowned fashion brands like Gucci and Louis Vuitton are experimenting with virtual clothing, introducing them as NFTs. Successful brand collaborations are also being carried out in the gaming sector with initiatives like Valentino x Animal Crossing and Burberry x Blankos Block Party."}},{"id":"6LnhHmS_DM","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Even if you don’t have a big name in the fashion industry, you can still create a clothing line of digital Wearable Assets for the avatars people have in the metaverse. You can come up with interesting creations and help your friends in customizing their avatars. All digital wearable assets on XANA are represented by NFTs on the XANA blockchain, which means they can be sold on NFT Marketplaces allowing you to earn big through your digital wearables."}},{"id":"OxRhop7gWo","type":"header","data":{"text":"Real Estate","level":2}},{"id":"dmYplZ_2Dr","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Lately, virtual real estate has seen a massive boom, with a craze amongst people to seek digital land in notable metaverses like The Sandbox and Decentraland. Virtual plots in prominent locations have a lot of value and can help owners strike a jackpot."}},{"id":"bc_iMsLkVS","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"There are many ways to earn through virtual real estate, including re-selling the purchased property for a higher price. Developing your virtual land, and renting your property can also become a decent source of income. People looking to host a virtual concert or an E-sports competition would gladly pay some kind of fee to rent out a virtual property that has already been developed to fit their needs."}},{"id":"ai_faoPhS7","type":"header","data":{"text":"Create and Earn on XANA","level":2}},{"id":"tKt7hV3RWV","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Not all metaverses empower users to generate an income through their creativity. XANA is a metaverse that enables user-generated content and encourages users to come up with multiple earning opportunities because of its decentralized system. This is just the beginning of the metaverse, and in the coming years it will drastically improve our lives just like the first iteration of the internet did many years ago."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}

game_info.name: XANA
game_info.description: XANA is an EVM sidechain custom-built for the Metaverse. Compatible with all popular wallets, bridged with all major blockchains, and already adopted by the major institutions and global brands.

staffs.name: Kieran Warwick
staffs.description: Kieran is a proven serial entrepreneur. Working alongside his brother Kain Warwick in e-commerce, Kieran was exposed to Bitcoin and Ethereum early on. His enthusiasm for the crypto space led to joining Blueshyft. While there, Kieran successfully onboarded major Australian Exchanges and started the world’s first OTC cryptocurrency exchange.

staffs.name: Aaron Warwick
staffs.description: While studying Computer Engineering and Physics at the University of Wollongong in Australia, Aaron found himself obsessed with building and programming games. An avid seeker of scientific knowledge and the philosophical implications of technology his interest in artificial intelligence sprouted at an early age. Aaron's unique knowledge of world-building and game lore has guided Illuvium’s vision to create the world's first AAA game built on the Ethereum blockchain.

staffs.name: John Avery
staffs.description: John has a 20-year career in both the gaming and the financial services industries. His game development career started when he began producing games for the App Store in the late 2000s, and since then, his games have reached over 1 million users. His company JNA Mobile was also one of the top Unity Asset Store publishers at the time.

staffs.name: Basil Gorin
staffs.description: Basil has over 15 years of experience as a full-stack developer, with experience as a solution architect, tech designer and software engineer. He has a strong background in Java, Web, and Blockchain tech stacks.

staffs.name: Danny Wilson
staffs.description: Danny is a business executive and partnership leader with over 20 years of success in amplifying business performance to hit top goals. Danny has held multiple director and leadership roles in varying retail and tech-based organisations, making him an invaluable asset to Illuvium.

staffs.name: Nate Wells
staffs.description: With 20+ years in the gaming industry, Nate Wells is known for his work in Bioshock & Bioshock Infinite. He was also a Lead Game Producer on The Last of Us, and Rise of the Tomb Raider. As an art direction and UX consultant, Nate aims to help projects find their visual focus.

staffs.name: Rogier van de Beek
staffs.description: For over 10 years, Rogier has been a freelance concept artist and illustrator, who’s worked on a wide variety of projects, ranging from print, film, toys, theme parks, and of course, games.

staffs.name: Aleksandr Kirilenko
staffs.description: Aleksandr has worked in the advertisement industry as a freelance 3D modeller for such giants as Pepsi, Sony, and Toyota. Aleksandr's creative flair and skill is an essential asset to Illuvium, as he has worked on character/creature development game cinematics at Platigue Image. He also worked as a digital sculptor for Prime 1 Studio and a senior character artist at Ninja Theory.

staffs.name: Alexandre Belbari
staffs.description: Alexandre began learning animation in the South of France in 2008. After graduating in 2010, he began working with Marvel on projects, (like X-Men!), and over the next four years, he was able to learn from some of the best animators in the industry. With his wealth of experience under his belt, Alexandre then moved to ILM Lucasfilm, where he worked on notable projects including Transformers, Avengers, Guardians of the Galaxies, Godzilla and Ready Player One.

staffs.name: Petr Ermolaev
staffs.description: "I am from Russia, the city of Moscow. I am a VFX artist. In early 2021, I was lucky enough to get into the Illuvium team. It is interesting to observe the development of the project from the very beginning."

staffs.name: Dmitriy Ten
staffs.description: Dmitriy Ten took the print advertising world by storm when he became the lead artist at Cream Electric Art in Sydney, Australia, one of the world's most renowned and respected print advertising firms.

staffs.name: Pedro Bergamini
staffs.description: Pedro is a full-stack engineer experienced in B2B, using NodeJS and AWS services like Lambda, DynamoDB and Cognito. His knowledge of creating expert user interfaces via React is outstanding (it's no wonder since he has been coding since the age of 13!).

staffs.name: Lionel Pinkhard
staffs.description: Lionel is a software engineer with over 19 years of experience in software development across various industries, particularly gaming, cryptography and telecommunications. His experience is paramount to our success.

staffs.name: Andrew Wall
staffs.description: A seasoned gaming, finance and media executive Andrew Wall aka 'Awall', co-founded the largest gaming creator network of all-time, TGN. Over the past 15 years, he has produced 5000+ gaming videos that generated over a billion views, live streamed full-time on Twitch, and has personally advised 100s of the top content creators and finance publishing companies.

about.introduction: {"time":1665545865487,"blocks":[{"id":"S4GBR6TyFo","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"You take the role of a survivor of a transport vessel in an intergalactic space fleet, investigating a perplexing distress beacon. When you finally reach the origin of the call, you discover a ruined planet, possibly the mythical cradle of your race’s civilization. A vast crystal ocean engulfs all but a tiny fraction of the planet. Extreme weather events assault the surface, giving way to strikingly varied climates. A burst of radiation disables the ship’s engines and you slam into the planet’s surface. Crawling free from the wreckage, you discover majestic beasts, some with near godlike power. Could this be what caused the downfall of this planet? Luckily, your race has begun to master the same energy that the Illuvials harness, and you are able to capture and control the deity-like fauna into slivers of crystal called Shards, mined from the planet’s surface. To uncover the mysteries of the planet, you become a Hunter, traveling across the land subduing and capturing Illuvials, and trying to unlock the Obelisks that keep most of the world closed off."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}
about.roadmap_text: {"time":1665545944420,"blocks":[{"id":"iF_U9SIrRJ","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Technology"}},{"id":"-BLTY7dEXZ","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Initial Prototype - November 2020 (Completed)"}},{"id":"gOi5Z2JiJk","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Transition to Unreal Engine - December 2020 (Completed)"}},{"id":"7R7EXHoVfT","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Token Smart Contract - February 2021 (Completed)"}},{"id":"SEpRIYWLdb","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"First Cinematic Trailer - March 2021 (Completed)"}},{"id":"5Wnyo3i4Jg","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Yield Farm Contracts V1 - May 2021 (Completed)"}},{"id":"N6X0C9MVHb","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Auto Battler Trailer - August / September (In development)"}},{"id":"LX-Cmu3szk","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Yield Farm Contracts V2 - September / October (In development)"}},{"id":"3kV5UiSF0Y","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Private Beta - Q1 2022"}},{"id":"7ajZk1yEV0","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Public Beta Launch - Q2 2022"}},{"id":"o_pLJaxtPE","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Illuvium: Zero - Q2 2022"}},{"id":"OdMM2yyFfz","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Mobile Release - 2023"}},{"id":"CFAZEMCnIz","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Second Major Illuvium Title - TBA"}},{"id":"Z4UdsDSXA3","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Sales"}},{"id":"Pb8oM3MbHS","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Pre Seed - December 2020 (Completed)"}},{"id":"yOCSQUi2-p","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Seed Sale - January 2021 (Completed)"}},{"id":"f9u-TmAVU2","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Balancer Liquidity Bootstrap Sale - March 2021 (Completed)"}},{"id":"871p_VMbcf","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"SushiSwap Liquidity Pool - April 2021 (Completed)"}},{"id":"wRAlhwxsm_","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Yield Farming - May 2021 (Completed)"}},{"id":"jA5vBbaADF","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Illuvium: Zero Land Sale (To be ratified)"}}],"version":"2.23.2"}
about.play_mode: {"time":1665545869499,"blocks":[{"id":"cRCFoJApe5","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Start by customising your character. Then select your Polymorphic Subordinate Drone. Once you and your sidekick are ready, you can then head out to explore the various regions of the world, and the mysteries that shattered it. As you adventure, you will encounter Illuvials that you can fight. If you subdue them, use a Shard to snap them up so they are yours permanently. Be careful though, Shards have varying power levels. Less powerful Shards are likely to fail against powerful Illuvials. For players just starting out, you will be able to mine free shards that are only capable of capturing a select few Illuvials that are far less powerful than some. But you will be able to get started in the game without any expense and learn the mechanics. We feel this is a welcome change from games that require a large amount of capital upfront to play. There are many regions to explore, but most will be inaccessible to the first generation of players. Over time, players will unlock Obelisks which allow for travel to new beautiful, challenging, and important regions that come with new Illuvials to battle and collect, and shed more light on the enigma that happened here."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}
about.play_to_earn_model: {"time":1665546549269,"blocks":[{"id":"9ylnogL1rE","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Earn while playing"}},{"id":"iPKU9n-u4O","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Earn crypto in ILV tokens as in-game rewards through playing, completing PVE quests, performing special achievements, and win prizes in tournaments and events."}},{"id":"WPg4MADBNc","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Wager on Battles"}},{"id":"1YlOXRva5x","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Participate in and/or wager on matches in the Leviathan Arena, a PVP Battle Arena where players can battle each other to prove who is the strongest Ranger on Illuvium."}},{"id":"fsqKPAcKYL","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Trading on the marketplace"}},{"id":"GE3EeQn4YC","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Sell and trade captured Illuvials, farmed materials and other collectable/crafted NFT items on the IlluviDEX, Illuvium’s NFT marketplace, with zero gas fees for peer-to-peer trading with instant transactions thanks to integration with Immutable X."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}

game_info.name: Illuvium
game_info.description: Illuvium is an upcoming open-world RPG that bears some similarities to Pokemon, in that players traverse a digital world filled with rare and unusual monsters (known as Illuvials) that can be captured, collected, trained, and battled.

about.introduction: {"time":1667978054973,"blocks":[{"id":"C7uEpUafOs","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Planet IX is a crypto game. Or to be exact – An NFT-based strategy game. With a virtual copy of planet earth as your arena, your goal is to restore the planet to its former green and blue glory – and you do it by collecting virtual pieces of land called PIX. Planet IX happens to consist of a humble 1,6 billion PIX, all of which also are individual NFTs. "}},{"id":"Dn8q7n6Zyy","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Planet IX is at the forefront of a revolution in the virtual land strategy development space. It provides tools to decentralize and empower the gaming community, while also helping individuals use their passion and skill to play and build businesses. Blurring the lines between the digital and the physical world, we and the players redefine the term reality again and again. The game aims to empower players both in their gaming experience and with real-life rewards."}},{"id":"bGJPtYqxTm","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The team behind Planet IX believes in a decentralized gaming experience, where the game creators don’t have sole ownership. The true vision of Planet IX is to give the players full control of their gaming experience. Users will be able to define both PIX development and gaming flow, while also earning rewards with the proceeds from Planet IX Tokenomics. Planet IX community members can also add and earn greater value by developing PIX Territories or by acquiring Landmarks (more on these assets in the next pages)."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}
about.features_text: {"time":1667978244841,"blocks":[{"id":"u7uRAotEzu","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Planet IX aims to empower players both in their gaming experience and with real-life rewards. The development of social media giants such as META has allowed hundreds of millions of people to gather, interact, share content and play games together. The networks led to the formation of huge online communities and gaming companies, but the platforms themselves are under the control of centralized entities. That means that the participants in these online communities don’t have true ownership over their virtual environments, nor over the digital assets within them."}},{"id":"KCkr8J2pj1","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Community collaboration is key to building a more sustainable world – a world that can also be profitable. Just as in the real world, the value of PIX on Planet IX is affected by how owners choose to develop their land. The emerging possibilities of what can be created in the metaverse is one of the core drivers of interest in the game. Eventually, this development will culminate in earning potential utility rewards by gaining native Planet IX Tokens."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}

game_info.name: Planet IX
game_info.description:
In Planet IX, you can connect your Land to earn IXT. You’ll
also be able to farm your way to the IXT without investing anything other than your time. Connect your land and help rejuvenate the broken lands and Build the Planet of Tomorrow.

about.introduction: {"time":1655345612142,"blocks":[{"id":"s9-KHs-vHC","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"ASPO World is a magic card NFT game constructed and developed based on the Blockchain platform by a team of potential developers with significant experience in the game-technology industry. By joining ASPO World, players can freely interact with other players in a massive virtual world by participating in matches, completing missions, and receiving unique items or game tokens.On contrary to today's NFT games on the market, ASPO World boasts a serious investment in plot, graphics, and gameplay. In order to defeat other opponents and get closer to the Sorcerer King's throne, ASPO World requires players to equip themselves with high tactical thinking skills. Depending on the battle strategy, the way to map the main character as well as the Spirits, gamers can create dramatic, interesting fights and win the victory."}},{"id":"lc7k79Nccj","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Players joining ASPO World are required to choose one of the three classes ASPO has designed (Fighter, Hunter and Witch) as their main character along with 4 four other companions (spirits) to form a strong team in the arena. By engaging in the battles and activities, players can claim NFTs that can be traded on Marketplace. Players in ASPO World do not individually go on the journey on their own but with other companions. In particular, we are developing the Guild feature to create better player connections. In the future, we expect to organize tournaments for the whole community of ASPO to join, making the game as interactive as possible. We create ASPO World with the aim of promoting Vietnamese NFT games to the global playing field and we hope to put players as the center of this and all of our next games."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}
about.play_mode: {"time":1652945581124,"blocks":[{"id":"Gq-wq_uVsW","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"We have PvE, PvP, and guild battle modes. In addition, we also have NFT dungeons for players to fight bosses and hunt items."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}
about.play_to_earn_model: {"time":1652945586994,"blocks":[{"id":"NBQOaZQbtq","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"ASPO World is going to be an exemplary of the play to earn model (P2E model) in this era of digital assets. Players in ASPO World can engage in the daily activities and PvP battles to claim items, whose values are determined by its rarity. They can then trade them on the Marketplace to earn money."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}

game_info.name: ASPO World
game_info.description: ASPO is expected as a game universe backed by a strong and talented Vietnamese team with the hope of turning P2E games into the future of digital assets

about.introduction: {"time":1655290551268,"blocks":[{"id":"Z7d7eNRcAj","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Gunstar Metaverse (Gunstar) is a massively multiplayer online role-playing (RPG) and turn-based strategy NFT Game that gives you the real value of enjoyment and excitement in gaming and the real value provided through the blockchain platform."}},{"id":"VZF8CVzEcA","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Gunstar is a cyber-prone game for professional gamers or any kinds of users to test their skills and corporate with their correspondents in an attempt to create the ultimate-high shoot, or even have the golden opportunities to engage in so-called whirlwind intellectual games to gain unforgettable victory."}},{"id":"2sykxQfKTO","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Gunstar and Fantasy Star World will also imbue players with the experience of reality-based adventures, something that goes beyond what a mere tactic game usually offers. Enthusiasm, thrilling anticipation while playing are core to allure customers interest."}},{"id":"WJy563MriM","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Let enjoy your shot, your adventure in Star World."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}
about.features_text: {"time":1653035670086,"blocks":[{"id":"JtsqJO3RVQ","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Turn-based artillery"}},{"id":"n617e6xDoP","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"As a turn-based game, we focus on skill and game analysis. Moreover, players need to understand the companion pet chosen to be able to optimize their abilities. With the help of technology, in addition to the power of pets, you can also use the power of human technology to make it easier for you to adventure in the world."}},{"id":"21TNnJ1XVR","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Core gameplay"}},{"id":"nca9jyQUis","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"As a turn-based artillery game, so this game inherits all of its gameplay. Gunstar is a 2D game that bears the properties of a turn-based and ballistics simulation game. In Gunstar, players are placed on 2 opposing teams, either the enemy is AI or a player. They will take turns firing at each other with their royalty \"pet\". Each pet has 2 unique weapons, named as Normal Weapon and Ultimate Weapon. This game also has external factors affected by the result of a match, like terrains condition, winds, storms, ... acquire players to continuously change their aim and trajectory power while rethinking their strategy at the same time. The predicted trajectory system is implemented to support everyone getting into the entry point, but still, calculation skills are the key important to showing-off here."}},{"id":"Bb_EXjlhQt","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Pet"}},{"id":"GBLdLJ3B2-","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Accompanying players are extremely powerful pets, even with summoned beasts such as dragons, phoenixes, unicorns, etc. There are a total of 23 types of pets with different strengths and abilities."}},{"id":"5nl5BWI1Eg","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Especially these 23 types of pets are not the same, they are divided into many types depending on their mythological level such as: Ascended, Legendary, Elite, Rare, Normal..etc"}},{"id":"WFrdTDjItw","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Pet Fragment & Merging system"}},{"id":"f8twUHdeJL","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"By playing the game, especially at the Boss stage, it has a chance to drop Pet Fragment. When you collect enough Pet Fragment required for a Pet, you can choose to Merge. After that, you can choose and use it in the match."}},{"id":"zl0nF31yFj","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Please take note that there will be a percentage of Merging. The more rarity it has, the harder the percentage."}},{"id":"v_T7MKJwq_","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"In-game item"}},{"id":"T1cwHPlJmh","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Besides weapons for your beloved pet, human technology also creates items to support you on every match. There are currently a few types of items:"}},{"id":"TTs4P5BxeN","type":"mediaLib","data":{"name":"mediaLibraryStrapi"}},{"id":"UBEctyfkx0","type":"list","data":{"style":"unordered","items":["Teleport: Teleport to a destination on a map. It has no effect if you choose outside the map","Medicine: This item heal your pet, make you live longer.","Double: Allow user to fire twice at the same time. Can only be used with Normal Weapon.","Power Up: Allow user to fire a stronger shot. Can only be used with Ultimate Weapon.","Immunity: Give you the ability of phoenix, immunity to all damage until your next turn.","Shovel: Make your explosions bigger for your shot in 1 turn."]}},{"id":"5vQlmSmrGu","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"You can select up to 3 items for a match. The only way to get these items is using the soft currency (GSC) of the game and buying them from the fortune wheel."}},{"id":"xw_9mhX1QS","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Strengthen character"}},{"id":"ZVo8xX3qBo","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"As a hero, you will collect experience after every match you play & win. Your character will become stronger and stronger over time."}},{"id":"YztDFluqnJ","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Renting pet"}},{"id":"wyP3XM7YQO","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The main power of a fight, as always, is your pet. So the stronger pet, the easier to defeat the opponent. But sometimes, it's not as easy as talk for getting a legendary pet, so we implement the system in which you can borrow your pet from the market for a period of time."}},{"id":"GIKT6o16EN","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Once the pet has been rent, you are allowed to use its full features during the activating time. You need to pay the Pet's owner a fee depending on the market."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}
about.play_mode:
{"time":1655350087108,"blocks":[{"id":"_j5Qlpx-L_","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Gunstar is a 2D game that bears the properties of a turn-based and ballistics simulation game.

In Gunstar, players are placed on 2 opposing teams, the opponent either is an AI monster or a player. They will take turns firing at each other with their pet.

Each pet has 3 unique skills; 2 normal skill and an Ultimate skill.

This game also has external factors affected by the result of a match, like terrains condition, winds, and storms. This require players to continuously change their aim and trajectory power while rethinking their strategy at the same time.

The predictive trajectory system is implemented to assist new players to understand the game quicker, but since it doesn't terrains, winds, and weather conditions, players still need skill, experience and calculation in order to beat the opponent."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}

Standard BEP-721 NFT transaction"}},{"id":"d8DEniIfUo","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"4. Batch transaction of ERC-721 NFT protocol"}},{"id":"35mBzy4_ev","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"5. Bidding auction of GameFi assets"}},{"id":"iP7YkpEO0T","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"6. Offer function of GameFi assets"}},{"id":"pXhXGILkUw","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"7. Maker and taker function"}},{"id":"R6jtVx0J0F","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"3.3 SIDECHAIN"}},{"id":"CIBONwPG0M","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"BinaryX will establish a GameFi sidechain with two-way data communication with the BNB Chain main network. The sidechain will have the following features:"}},{"id":"8oKrDRMZHu","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"a.The data is two-way interoperable with the BNB Chain main chain, and users can quickly transfer various assets between the BNB Chain’s main chain and the GameFi sidechain at any time."}},{"id":"knQ3url9rO","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"b. about.play_mode:
{"time":1671423883250,"blocks":[{"id":"18xdDgfdK1","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Recruit Heros"}},{"id":"P82DDh2AhT","type":"list","data":{"style":"unordered","items":["Recruiting heroes is the first job to open the gate of cyberdragon","It expands your power and generates revenue regularly
","BNX and BUSD are indispensable tokens for recruiting heroes
","Please get them ready and start your journey"]}},{"id":"tSrPwzXOmv","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Adventure: Villages, battlefields, forests, and every piece of land on the cyberland are full of temptation, which will grab your eyes so that you will stop by the places of battles and trials. Becoming the lord here to take away the wealth that belongs to you is the only way for every player!"}},{"id":"y-l1ZfFTzL","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Daily Mining: Each hero has a different talent and skill, which is your unique honor. There are BNX, crystal, gold and other wealth resources in the mine. Hard-working heroes can earn rewards for their work in the mine. Of course, if you level up, you can get higher resources, which will bring you endless imagination in the dungeon exploration."}},{"id":"tvoQi2dVvL","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Challenger Competition: Here is the hero's temple, the overlord's arena, but also the sacred domain leading to the gate of wealth. Our regular open hero competitions such as the trial results and wealth gathering carnival banquets will make you strong and keep your status & power that you deserve to have."}},{"id":"a1kl-KngeN","type":"header","data":{"text":"CyberLand - Gameplay","level":2}},{"id":"Q81hGhIN96","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Lands"}},{"id":"l0Ojqgdxrk","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The land in the game is divided into four categories: snowfield, plain, desert, and swamp. Owning the NFT of any land gives the player the ownership of a specific land in the game."}},{"id":"CZNtIiujFe","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Materials & Resources"}},{"id":"qUjKR5UeM0","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"There are many different kinds of resources, including minerals, wood, gems, stones, food, and more."}},{"id":"4z7iIuermI","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"In CyberLand, most of the activities, such as constructing a building, crafting equipment and supplies, or developing technology, require a certain amount of basic resources."}},{"id":"XPup2QwKOW","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Buildings & Structure"}},{"id":"lTuLXlN0QZ","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Players can construct different buildings through blueprints by spending resources and materials. After a certain building is established, players can start recruiting certain NPCs, such as blacksmiths, merchants, auction houses, pharmacists, etc. to further improve the national strength."}},{"id":"quzBQ4zZYC","type":"header","data":{"text":"CyberChess - Gameplay","level":2}},{"id":"LOMUNcaMrF","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"CyberChess is an auto chess strategy game. As a free to play, play to earn game, CyberChess was designed to allow players to start playing the game without having to make an initial investment. Besides, CyberChess has an option for Players to recharge their account with our Gold token to make in-game purchases to summon new heroes and acquire new skills."}},{"id":"LGrhuW9w0r","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"There were 3 design principles going into developing Cyberchess."}},{"id":"VTls_f7dfT","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"1. Strategic and competitive:"}},{"id":"pG2KY3T3Pc","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"We were inspired to build this game after gathering feedback from our community. that they wanted something more tactical and strategy-based. CyberChess is essentially a step up from CyberDragon, and includes more complex gameplay, more customization in terms of heroes and skills."}},{"id":"prwFnJFR9A","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"2. Lower barrier to entry:"}},{"id":"UOSRWyJdpT","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Given the current market conditions, we were very mindful of added fees for players to start the game, such as initial investment and gas fees"}},{"id":"ZFrA5PBgPO","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"3. Better quality:"}},{"id":"eQrgRW0-uu","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The market is moving fast, and the quality of web3 games have been rapidly accelerated. On this end, we set out to expand our development team to incorporate more game developers from the traditional gaming space."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}

about.introduction: {"time":1656905515868,"blocks":[{"id":"yT6ZzYQ4SA","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Blockchain Monster Hunt is the world’s first multi-chain metaverse game that connects people from different blockchain communities. Inspired by Pokémon GO, Blockchain Monster Hunt allows users to play and earn in an abundantly diverse world of monsters."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}
about.features_text: {"time":1656905537665,"blocks":[{"id":"jFJ7-j6Jib","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Cross-chain Technology: BCMH has created a cross-chain integrated gamers community that will continue to grow strongly anytime a new chain is connected."}},{"id":"dxbGiTAGRw","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Decentralization: BCMHunters are amongst the first few that embraced the true spirit of decentralization. Every aspect of the game is completely unchained."}},{"id":"jjLn4sJENp","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Unpredictable: Monsters NFT are born from the blockchain itself with attributes decided by the block hash which are unpredictable. Players can have a never-ending journey to explore the battle and hunting monster world."}},{"id":"SclVZVSW-I","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Play-to-Earn: Blockchain defenders(players) can earn money while playing."}},{"id":"qGHQ3juXwA","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Continuously game updates: The game developers always listen to their users and relentlessly giving interesting updates from game features, UI/UX to the storyline, with the ultimate goal to please the most difficult users into the Blockchain Monster World."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}
about.play_mode: {"time":1656905629732,"blocks":[{"id":"1bqhLTP-Av","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"There are 2 modes in Blockchain Monster Hunt that the users can go for: Multiverse and Staking."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}
about.play_to_earn_model: {"time":1656905571286,"blocks":[{"id":"MhoYXhUIGm","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Blockchain Monster Hunt launched the mainnet on January 25, is a play-to-earn crypto game where players continuously explore new places on the blockchain to hunt and battle monsters, have fun playing while earning."}},{"id":"KnkidsnRL3","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"With a reasonable investment, from 10 USD, players can choose to buy monsters to hunt many other monsters in the world of Blockchain Monster Hunt (up to +1,000 Monsters), including very rare and powerful monsters. From then, sell on the market to make profits. In addition, winning battles also helps players to earn energy directly, convert to $BCMC and sell to earn income. Players can upgrade to VIP Tier, or join Guilds to increase the bonus % (which is up to 40%), and earn even more!"}},{"id":"qjJFZbUte0","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Last but not least, Blockchain Monster Hunt always has in-game events, events with partners, as well as weekly recap, weekly livestream, with other attractive rewards from tokens( (of not only $BCMC, but also $BUSD, $BNB, $MATIC, $GLMR, etc.)  to NFTs, from which users can also participate and earn."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}
